name: Github Finder
info: Github Finder is an website made using Vue.js. It presents your Github profile in a better way with user, language and repository stats.

name: BlogScape
info: BlogScape is a blogging site built using Node.js and MongoDB where users can log in using theit Google accounts and create public and private blogs, see other users' blogs and like them.

name: Hover Chat
info: Hover Chat is a chat application built using Node.js and Socket.io. Users can private create rooms and share their location and send each other messages. It is currently being worked on.

name: Shrinkr
info: Prisma is a voice assistant made using Python. It uses Google Speech API to recogonise speech and answer simple queries, search on google and youtube, take screenshots, do simple math and play rock, paper, scissors.
